text: Oleg Syrokvashko (; ; 3 August 1961 – 16 July 2016) was a Belarusian professional football coach and a former player. He spent the majority of his playing and coaching career at Dinamo Brest. He died at the age of 54 after a long-term illness. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Minsk Category:Soviet footballers Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Belarusian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Expatriate footballers in Uzbekistan Category:Belarusian expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Belarusian expatriate sportspeople in Uzbekistan Category:Belarusian football managers Category:FC Dynamo Brest players Category:FC Dinamo Minsk players Category:FC Torpedo Minsk players Category:NK Veres Rivne players Category:Victoria Jaworzno players Category:Navbahor Namangan players Category:FC Kobrin players Category:FC Dynamo Brest managers Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Oleg Syrokvashko
